answers.answer: I would like to see a whole lot more of those Glida contribution boxes.  Walgreens is offering gift cards to those being screened for breast cancer.  It would be nice if they included a pamphlet on ovca awareness with the breast cancer gift card. Marie
OVCA is the poor sister to Breast Cancer. I certainly would like to see more attention be given to OVCA

I would like to see all women's cancers banded together for raising research money and awareness.  That to me would be powerful.  Until something changes we will just continue spreading the word the best ways we can.  Springfield was sure a great starting place thanks to Chris and he helpers.  Marie

That would be a dream come true for so many of us. I think that next spring would bwe a good time to start our "campaign" for ov ca awareness. I intend to start flooding businesses with e-mails and even the Chamber of Commerce in cities across the country. I would love to see more cities take after Boston and intend on using that as a reference. And hey, why not the White House? They went pink didn't they? No reason they cannot go teal.Chris

question: I was so happy today when I went into WAWA (which is a convienent store like 7 ELeven throughout NJ) and when I approached the register there was a contribution box supporting the Gilda Radner Foundation!  I have never seen one specifically for OVCA...Its about time! I always see Diabetes, MS, Muscular Dystrophy, etc....Maybe the word is finally getting out there...I truly hope so!I just wanted you all to know I made a donation in honor of you all.....Love, Gia
title: Gilda Radner Foundation
